701679f-a.text:
Quarry Road (left), at its junction with Lafontaine Avenue, showing the public place constructed by the Works Progress Administration. The frame buildings on the right are numbers 8161 to 2170 Lafontaine Avenue. The view is north from Oak Tree Place (foreground).

Jan. 26, 1937

W.P.A. Photo
Five Boroughs Project
701679f-a.folder: Quarry Road & Lafontaine Avenue, Bronx, NY
